title: Select hymns, taken out of Mr. Herbert's Temple, and turn'd into the common metre To be sung in the tunes ordinarily us'd in churches.
author: Herbert, George, 1593-1633.
publisher: printed by S. Bridge, for Thomas Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns, at the lower end of Cheapside, near Mercers Chappel,
notes: Advertisement on A3v; three final advertisement pages.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London.
